techmeme.title: Mistral raised a €1.7B Series C at an €11.7B valuation; ASML led the round with €1.3B to become its largest shareholder, joined by a16z, DST, and others (Tim Bradshaw/Financial Times)
Helsinki-based ReOrbit, which builds satellites and a software platform to help countries fully control their satellite systems, raised a €45M Series A (Anna Heim/TechCrunch)
The UK Electoral Commission says it took three years and over £250K to recover from an August 2021 hack that exposed private data of 40M voters to Chinese spies (Joe Tidy/BBC)
The Nepalese government lifts its social media ban after local media reported 19+ deaths in clashes over anti-government demonstrations sparked by the ban (Gopal Sharma/Reuters)
Evan Spiegel says Snap is restructuring around small "squads" of 10 to 15 people to compete better; Snapchat+ now brings in $700M+ in ARR from 15M+ paying users (Connie Loizos/TechCrunch)
